item.description:
First Terri will demonstrate the kit with a regular point and shoot camera digital camera to show how the kit works and can be used at home without having to learn or buy a fancy camera.

She'll also cover some key techniques if you have one of those fancy cameras.

Then, everyone will have a chance to either shoot their work (so bring your digital camera) or Terri will take some shots for you.

Bring two or three pieces you'd like to have photographed as well as your digital camera. If you don't have a camera, you may want to bring along a USB key so that you can take your pictures home with you. Alternatively, we can try to email them as well.

This should be lots of fun. NO MORE THAN 5 STUDENTS THIS TIME SO BE SURE TO REGISTER

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Learn to Photograph Your Work - Jewelry & all requiring a lightbox ($20)
